FirstCard.title: Professional Skills
FirstCard.description: Relative to most young professionals my age, I have a diverse set of expereinces and interests that have helped me build a wide variety of skills. I excel most in positions where I work directly with others. I have a very strong work ethic and leadership qualities.
FirstCard.subtitle: Most Frequently Used Skills
